name: Double-breasted blazer
description: Double-breasted blazer in twill with contrasting-colour details. Featuring peak lapels, buttons down the front, jetted front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

name: Open-back dress
description: Short, fitted dress in a sturdy weave. Features a round neckline, two covered buttons at the back of the neck and an open back with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the waist. Shaping seams down the front for a flattering silhouette, and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined.

name: Teddy jacket
description: Jacket in soft teddy with a high collar, concealed zip down the front, dropped shoulders and welt side pockets. Lined.

name: Quilted jacket
description: Lightly padded jacket in quilted nylon with a round neckline and press-studs down the front. Discreet side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

name: Oversized quilted jacket
description: Oversized, lightly padded jacket in quilted nylon. Ribbed stand collar, zip down the front and patch front pockets with a flap. Straight-cut hem with curved side vents. Lined.

name: Bomber jacket
description: Short, padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

name: Oversized puffer jacket
description: Oversized puffer jacket in woven fabric featuring a stand-up collar lined with fluffy fabric. Zip down the front, welt front pockets with a concealed press-stud and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring with cord stoppers at the hem. Lined.

name: T
description: T

name: Oversized shacket
description: Shacket in woven fabric with a collar and press-studs down the front. Patch chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and a yoke with pleats at the back. Gently dropped shoulders and a press-stud at the cuffs. Curved hem with side vents. Lined.

name: Bomber jacket
description: Short bomber jacket with a soft, napped finish. Ribbed stand collar, concealed zip down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

name: Teddy jacket
description: Jacket in soft teddy with a stand collar and buttons down the front. Welt side pockets and gently dropped shoulders. Lined.

name: Zip-through sports jacket
description: hort, zip-through sports jacket in functional fabric made with SoftMove™, which provides the ultimate in softness and comfort plus contouring support, and DryMove™, which helps pull moisture away from your skin. Slim fit with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with an anti-chafe chin guard. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes.

name: Velour jacket
description: Short, oversized jacket in soft velour with a stand collar and zip and wind flap down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs and gathers around the hem. Lined.

name: Fluffy coat
description: Coat in fluffy fabric with a round neckline, concealed hook-and-eye fastening down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

name: Oversized teddy jacket
description: Oversized jacket in soft teddy with a small stand collar, zip down the front and discreet side pockets.

name: Teddy gilet
description: Loose-fit gilet in soft teddy with narrow piping along the edges. Press-studs down the front and welt front pockets.

name: Cotton corduroy jacket
description: Short, fitted jacket in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Welt side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.

name: Coated jacket
description: Fitted jacket in coated fabric with a V-neckline and covered buttons down the front. Long sleeves that taper to the cuffs and jetted front pockets with a flap. Nipped-in waist for a flattering silhouette. Lined.

name: Hooded jacket
description: Short jacket in soft, fluffy fabric with an oversized hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.

name: Oversized printed T-shirt
description: versized T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

name: Oversized printed T-shirt
description: Oversized T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

name: Long-sleeved jersey top
description: Fitted top in soft jersey with a square neckline and long sleeves.

name: Viscose polo-neck top
description: Top in soft viscose jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.

name: Loose-fit T-shirt
description: Loose-fit T-shirt in soft jersey with a crew neck and dropped shoulders.

name: Collared rib-knit top
description: Long-sleeved top in a fine rib knit featuring a collar with a scalloped edge and a V-shaped opening at the front. Delicate picot trim at the cuffs and hem.

name: Long-sleeved microfibre top
description: Short, fitted top in soft microfibre with a square neckline and long sleeves. Lined over the bust.

name: Draped top
description: Fitted, long-sleeved top in jersey with pleats on one shoulder and at the opposite side of the waist to create a draped effect.

name: Layered-look top
description: Long-sleeved top in pointelle jersey with accent-colour trims at the neckline and hem to create a layered look. Deep, round neckline, button placket and a straight-cut hem.

name: Cowl neck top
description: Fitted top in stretch jersey with a cowl neckline and long sleeves.

name: Flared High Jeans
description: Jeans in slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and legs with wide, flared hems. Fake front pockets and real pockets at the back.

name: Wide Ultra High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in rigid cotton denim that feels firm at first but then softens and loosens with wear. Wide leg with a regular fit from the waist to the hip and a wide cut from the thigh to the hem. Extra-high waist with a zip fly and button. Regular length, designed to hit the top of the foot with little or no stacking. The wide-leg jean is a wardrobe essential.

name: Wide High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

name: Straight High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in rigid denim that feels firm at first but then softens and loosens with wear. Straight leg with a regular fit from the waist to the hip and a looser, straight cut from the thigh to the hem. High waist with a zip fly and button. Longer length, designed to fall over the foot with a stacking effect. This classic shape complements everything from hoodies to blazers.

name: Flared High Jeans
description: Jeans in slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and legs with wide, flared hems. Fake front pockets and real pockets at the back.

name: Skinny High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a skinny fit from the waist to the hem. High waist with a zip fly and button.

name: Wide High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

name: Oversized Fit Printed hoodie
description: Hoodie in printed heavyweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrap over hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a wide, ribbed trim at the cuffs and hem. Oversized fit for a baggy, extra-loose silhouette.

name: Loose Fit Zip-top sweatshirt
description: Top in heavyweight sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside and a print motif on the front. Stand collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

name: Oversized Fit Washed hoodie
description: Hoodie in heavyweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a washed look and a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Oversized fit for a baggy, extra-loose silhouette.

name: Loose Fit Zip-through hoodie
description: Zip-through hoodie in heavyweight cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and a two-way zip down the front. Designed with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and a ribbed trim at the hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

name: Relaxed Fit Sweatpants
description: Sweatpants in heavyweight cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Featuring covered elasticating at the waist, a fake fly and welt side pockets. Asymmetrical seams down the front and back. Finished with elasticated drawstrings at the hems. Relaxed fit for a casual but not oversized silhouette.

name: Oversized Fit Washed hoodie
description: Boxy-style hoodie in heavyweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a washed look featuring a lined wrap over hood, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Finished with a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Oversized fit for a baggy, extra-loose silhouette.

name: Regular Fit Hoodie
description: Long-sleeved hoodie in midweight sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Kangaroo pocket, double-layered drawstring hood with a wrap over front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.

name: Loose Fit Track jacket with side stripes
description: Track jacket in midweight scuba fabric with side stripes in woven fabric. Designed with a stand-up collar, two-way zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

name: Oversized Fit Printed hoodie
description: Hoodie in printed heavyweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrap over hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a wide, ribbed trim at the cuffs and hem. Oversized fit for a baggy, extra-loose silhouette.

name: Loose Fit Teddy zip-through hoodie
description: Zip-through hoodie in soft teddy with a zip down the front, patch front pockets and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves and elasticated binding at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.
